bibl.title: Official Deadlines in the Documentary Papyri of Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Proceeds to the answer of three questions: 1. Why did all this range of deadlines [1 day to 6 months] occur in the papyri? 2. Which is the system they based on? 3. How their duration was calculated? - Pp. 72-76: Appendix: Documentation [Nos 1-43].
LITINAS Nikos, Official Deadlines in the Documentary Papyri of Roman Egypt.
